description: Complete visual verification checklist across all pages and breakpoints
steps: Test all pages at 375px, 390px, 428px, 768px widths
Layout & Navigation: No horizontal scroll, sidebar drawer works, header responsive
Touch Targets: All interactive elements 44x44px minimum, 8px spacing
Tables & Lists: Cards on mobile, tables on desktop, all tappable
Filters & Pagination: Collapsible filters, badge counts, icon-only pagination
Charts: Reduced heights on mobile, readable labels, no overlap
Dialogs & Forms: Stacked buttons, 20px spacing, adequate margins
Detail Pages: Stacked headers, responsive grids, mobile lists
Dashboard: Stacked actions, responsive cards, all charts readable
Edge Cases: Empty states, loading skeletons, error messages, text truncation

description: Verify accessibility standards are met

description: Verify performance standards are met
